attributes.action: require that all MPs who have claimed money to which they were not entitled pay back every penny.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Some MPs are saying that their expenses are "following the rules" - but the rules state that expenses are for:

"wholly, exclusively and necessarily incurred when staying overnight away from their main UK residence…for the purposes of performing Parliamentary duties. This excludes expenses that have been incurred for purely personal or political purposes."

This does not include moat-clearing, wreaths, someone to change your light bulbs, a summer house or conservatory...

Any MP who has claimed for anything which is not "for the purposes of performing Parliamentary duties" should be forced to pay back every penny.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
